course_title: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in Computer Science
why_choose: Why choose this course? Opportunities for Interdisciplinary Collaboration Strong Alumni Network and Career Prospects Supportive and Engaging Learning Environment Specialisations in emerging areas Participation in International activities like con Access to funding and scholarships for research projects
what_learn: What you will learn? Deepen their knowledge of computer science fundamentals. Develop expertise in specialised areas of computer science. Conduct original research. Gain professional skills and experience. Expand their professional network.
modules: Modules Course Work Research Specific Year 1 Domain Specific Research Advisory Committee Presentations Dissertation submission Year 2 onwards Final Defence
career: Career prospects Faculty positions at universities and colleges Research positions at government labs and industry Software engineering positions at tech companies Data science positions at tech companies Information security positions at tech companies R & D Positions in Tech Companies.
